name: baseline-metrics-establish
title: Baseline Metrics Establishment Sequence
description: Generates initial baseline performance & reliability metrics from aggregated telemetry for anomaly & SLO evaluation.

steps.description: Load existing aggregated telemetry metrics artifact (.generated/telemetry-metrics.json).
Optionally refine raw metrics (pass-through in minimal slice).
Derive baseline statistics (p50, p95 latency, error rate, counts) and confidence levels.
Persist baseline to .generated/baseline-metrics.json with schema version & timestamp.
Emit completion event summarizing handler baseline counts & any low-confidence entries.

business_value: Provides objective historical reference enabling anomaly detection, SLO evaluation, and performance regression prevention.
initial_constraints: Requires telemetry parsing sequence executed first
Confidence low when sampleSize < 25 events per handler
Outlier filtering deferred to later slice

handlerName.p50: approximate median (simple derivation in minimal slice)

userStory.goal: the baseline-metrics-establish process to execute with measurable, auditable results and quantifiable KPIs
userStory.benefit: measurable business value with SLA compliance and performance tracking

businessValue: Enables measurable business value with SLA compliance and performance tracking; supports data-driven optimization
